transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%
+5% Ally Team Health
+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge damage
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%
+5% Ally Team Health
+25 Action Points at battle start

SKT_FIRST.name: Power of Light
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to remove <color=#28d9ed>1</color> <color=#28d9ed>debuff(s)</color> from all allies.
description: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000023_1_1]</color> chance to remove <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000023_1_1]</color> <color=#28d9ed>debuff(s)</color> from all allies.

SKT_SECOND.name: Gaze Upon Us
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Heals all allies' <color=#28d9ed>Health</color> by <color=#28d9ed>15%</color> of Saeran's Max Health. Additionally, recovers all other allies' <color=#28d9ed>Action Points</color> by <color=#28d9ed>25</color>.

SKT_BURST_2.effect: Removes all debuffs from the target

description: Heals all allies' <color=#28d9ed>Health</color> by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000023_2_1]</color> of Saeran's Max Health. Additionally, recovers all other allies' <color=#28d9ed>Action Points</color> by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000023_2_2]</color>.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Arise
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Heals one ally by <color=#28d9ed>55%</color> and reduces the target's <color=#28d9ed>skill cooldown</color> by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>. Additionally, increases the target's <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>50%</color>.
description: Heals one ally by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000023_3_1]</color> and reduces the target's <color=#28d9ed>skill cooldown</color> by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000023_3_2] turn(s)</color>. Additionally, increases the target's <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000023_3_3]</color>.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to increase all allies' Attack for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> chance to remove <color=#28d9ed>1</color> <color=#28d9ed>debuff(s)</color> from all allies.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000023_chain_1_1]</color> chance to increase all allies' Attack for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000023_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000023_backup_1_1]</color> chance to remove <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000023_backup_1_1]</color> <color=#28d9ed>debuff(s)</color> from all allies.
